title: Orison
desc:
Post 1905
- When you play this, you must pay two 🪄 **Spell Slots** to discard up to four cards that weren't part of your starting hand. If you had fewer than four such cards, gain one 🛡️ **Shield** for each discard opportunity you missed out on as a result of not having non-starting-hand cards to discard.
- This card is always playable if you have exactly two more 🪄 **Spell Slots** left.
